page.title: 15BMX riding in Kingswood.
page.content: My hobbies are computers, remote control cars, football and attending Kingswood Karate Club and Summit Youth Club.My main hobby is BMX racing which has become very popular in the 1980's for children.It is a fast, skilled, and expensive{sport.}To race, you must wear protective gear and have a BMX (costing Â£200).A BMX is a lightweight{ {bike}made from T45 aircraft material, covered in chrome.A crank, chain and wheels make it move.You{race}on a long dirt track, going in different directions.From a hill start you ride down, passing over jumps, built up mounds of earth called bumps, and tight bends called berms.In 1983 I won the British Championship for the Under 9's at Derby, and in 1985 qualified for the European Championship in Spain and World Championship in Canada.
